metadata.title: CVE-2022-0751 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inaccurate display of Snippet files containing special characters in allversions of GitLab CE/EE allows an attacker to create Snippets withmisleading content which could trick unsuspecting users into executingarbitrary commands

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
